pages.title: Too Hot?
pages.text: Too Hot?$(br)$(li)Wear no or wanderer armor$(li)Avoid direct Sunlight$(li)Drink Water & Drinks$(li)Use Ice Packs$(li)Jump in Water$(li)Stand next to cold blocks$(li)Switch Biomes

pages.title: Too Cold?
pages.text: $(li)Stay near heat source's$(li)Use Heating Stones$(li)Wear Wolf or Leather Armor$(li)Insulate Armor with:$(li2)Mammoth Fur$(li2)Polar Bear Fur$(li2)Bear Fur
